# Servers Purchase for Department of National Defence
## Tender Announcement

### Reference Information

* Reference Number: SSC-22-00020113
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: BPM016902/20113

### Tender Details

* Publication Date: September 8, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: September 21, 2022, 14:00:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
* Amendment Date: September 15, 2022

### Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking to acquire Network Time Protocol (NTP) servers, as specified in the solicitation. Considerations for the servers include:

* Support for 1 Gbit Ethernet connections
* Presence of an equivalent radio frequency (RF) splitter (one antenna feeding the same number of NTP servers)

The successful bidder will be responsible for delivering the NTP servers, which will be utilized by the Department of National Defence.

### Additional Information

* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Canada
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Raiyane Benchekroun
	+ Email: raiyane.benchekroun@ssc-spc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: 613 324 4061
	+ Fax: (613) 960-6007

### Attachments

The following files are available for review:

* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/ADF12A83-CC6A-4CBC-A2BE-62A91E84F267
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/9DFF55EF-95DD-4973-BB44-D98265E5A70B
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/DAB5225A-D90C-4204-AADE-2135482BA399

Please note that the notice URL and tender description are provided in both English and French. The contact information and attachments are also available in both English and French.
